org.ndsc.mimicIO.mip

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ndsc.mimicIO.mip.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorMessage, FenceMessage, HeartbeatMessage, HelloMessage, ManagementMessage, ModuleAcknowledgeMessage, ModuleAnnouncementMessage, NetconfMessage, OpenFlowMessage, OpFlexMessage, TopologyUpdateMessage

    public class Message
extends Object
    Class representing a simple NetIP message. This also is the base class for concrete message classes.
